title: FS: 5 SGC Graded: McGraw, Beckley, Chase, Murray, Willett

posts.post_title: FS: 5 SGC Graded: McGraw, Beckley, Chase, Murray, Willett
posts.post_content:
A mix of grades, delivery included.  Take all eight for $400.  Paypal preferred:

AVAILABLE
Jake Beckley:SC350-25 SGC A [trimmed] - $45
Hal Chase (Throwing, Dark Cap):SC460-25 SGC 50 - $90
John McGraw (Glove At Hip):SC460-42 SGC 45 - $140
Red Murray (Portrait) [a few small wrinkles, pencil]:P460-25 SGC 20 - $23
Ed Willett:P350 SGC 30 - $27

SOLD
Howie Camnitz (Arms Folded) [a little adhesive on back?]:SC350-25 SGC 35 - $30
Bill Clymer:P350 SGC 40 - $30
Harry Krause (Pitching):P350 SGC 40 - $35
Misters Krause and Clymer came in today. Thank you for the great transaction!
